name: Discipline!
wishText: Many many happy returns of the day! Today and everyday, just make yourself happy! Keep smiling! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, Somaya! Many many happy blah...
text2: Erokom ekta message dileo hoto! Tobe kaoke directly kokhon o wish korini to!
text3: R temon moneo thake na birthday gula! Tai vablam sundor kore ekta birthday card banano jay naki!
text4: Directly wish o korlam na, abar indirectly apna-apni hoyeo gelo! Mojar
